strIntroduction: The sauna with the highest popularity in Myeongdong, Hwanggeum Sauna provides you various kinds of spa with sophisticated facilities. Believe it or not, you can not only take a rest and refresh yourself, but getting prettier after the heat!
strTitle: Traditional Hwanggeum Sauna in Myeongdong

strIntroduction: Have you ever heard a province in Korea named Gyeonggi do? Although it's not that prosperous as Seoul, Gyeonggi do has lots of famous sightseeing spots, such as Nami Island, Petite France, and the Garden of MorningCalm! Hey, if you haven't been to these places, remember to plan them into your schedule!
strTitle: 1-day tour to Nami island, petite france and Gangchon Rail Bike

strIntroduction: Known as one of the summertime must-go places, Jeju Island not only has significant scenery on land but breeds abundance of living creatures under the sea. Wanna spend time with those adorable creatures and enjoy the view below sea level? Having a diving experience with a professional instructor will surely satisfied you!
strTitle: Diving in Jeju Island

strIntroduction: Have you ever heard of "semi-submarine"? Different from the normal one, semi-submarine only submerges part of itself in the sea, and owing to submerging half of the vessel in the water, you can enjoy both scenery on land and in the sea!
strTitle: Enjoy The Bay 101 Semi-submarine in Busan

strIntroduction: The most special tour- A day-trip to South and North Korea's border! You can feel the military atmosphere after Korean War as if you were a soldier then in this tour. Constructed by North Korea as a military incursions toward South Korea, The Third Tunnel was sealed right after discovered, and it's now open to visitors.
strTitle: 1-day tour to Panmunjom and the third tunnel

strIntroduction: Leave the busy city of Seoul behind on a one-day excursion to Mt Seorak (Seoraksan), South Korea’s third-highest mountain. As you explore with your fun and knowledgeable guide, see why this UNESCO-protected mountain is one of the country’s most popular destinations, named for its slowly melting covering of snow. Your one-day tour also visits tranquil temples and a thriving fish market, taking you behind the scenes to glimpse daily life in South Korea.
strTitle: Mt. Seorak 1 Day Tour

strIntroduction: Adorable hop-on hop-off bus is the most popular transportation to travel with in Busan recently! Among this loop tour, we'll pass through many popular scenic spots. Let's leave our footprints from Haedong Yonggungsa Temple, a beautiful temple over the sea, to Songjeong beach having dense pine forest!
strTitle: Busan City Tour Bus - Blue Line(HaedongYonggungsa Direction)

strIntroduction: A Non-verbal performance integrates Korea's traditional rhythm, Samulnori, with comedy and drama in the kitchen! Audiences of all ages and nationalities can enjoy! Everyone is welcome!

strIntroduction: Confident about your cooking skills and curious about Korean cuisine? Book this intermediate-level cooking class in the heart of Seoul, and prepare five dishes for lunch or dinner under the watchful eye of a professional chef. Depending on the day, you'll make either a Korean barbecue or a vegetarian feast that reflects the cooking of Korean Buddhist monks. Finish your class in the best way possible — sit down and savor your creations.

strIntroduction: Under the approval of the United Nations, come and take a guided tour to the border of South and North Korea! strIntroduction: See the sights of Seoul by night on this 4.5-hour tour and Han river cruise. Start with a ferry boarding for a scenic 1-hour Han river cruise, passing bridges and spotting landmarks along the waterfront as you listen to music and narration from your guide. Then ride a cable car to the observation deck at N Seoul Tower, an ideal place to view Seoul's cityscape.

strIntroduction: Trick and be tricked! Get ready for various theme show room in Trick Eye museum. And be sure your camera is fully charged with plenty of memory space before your visit!

strIntroduction: 全家來韓國旅遊，上有老下有小，還要自己做功課、找線路好煩啊，這行程完全～免擔心！現在，提供中文導遊全程包車陪同，只要帶著一顆愉悅心，想去哪就陪你去哪，解決任何旅遊中大大小小的事情，順利完成夢想中的旅遊行程！

strIntroduction: Do you feel tired or have edema after these days having fun in Seoul? Han-nan SPA, the well-facilitated spa center with skillful massagists, situated at the center of Seoul. Remember to relax yourself and let fatigue be swept away over here in your next Seoul trip!

strIntroduction: Let's explore Gyeongju, an ancient kingdom of the Silla Dynasty, for world heritage site!

strIntroduction: 一直令人夢寐以求的韓國婚紗，現在以呈現新娘自然優雅的氣質為主，色階柔和淡雅，特寫氣質滿分，全景則有完美比例。不僅model拍起來好看，在照片中每對新人看起來都宛如韓劇男女主角一樣美麗帥氣，浪漫又優雅的氛圍絕對值得一試！

Have you been to this living museum yet? If not, just schedule it in your trip!

strIntroduction: 以壯麗的自然景觀聞名的濟州島，滋潤愛情的浪漫旅程，一同乘坐山房山郵輪，遊賞大長今拍攝地－挾才裡海岸，聯合國教科文組織地質公園指定地－山房山，以及濟州島五大火山及十大美景之一的山房窟寺等美景！
